channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Playground fence in need of repair, 2nd November
item.description:
Arris rail rotted. Could be pushed out easily.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wirral Wood Close, Elmstead, London

item.title: Overhanging vegetation from gardens, 2nd November
item.description:
Vegetation in 2 places is severely blocking 1/2 the footpath causing pedestrians to walk in the road. Needs cutting back .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2A, Parkhurst Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass smashed and scattered on the pavement, 2nd November
item.description:
Bus Shelter B has been smashed yet again it was smashed on Friday night and repaired ( with glass ) on Saturday and then smashed again Saturday night again there’s glass all over the pavement which needs sweeping . I wondered if we could ask TfL to replace the glass with plastic because it must be costing a fortune to keep replacing it with glass night after night .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 133, Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Green bins dumped, 2nd November
item.description:
3rd time reporting!! Green bins dumped Junction of Crayford rd and Heath rd opposite A1 Carriages in Crayford Rd Stinking disgusting full bins been flytipped and been reported 3 times Please get rid I don’t know why the bin man haven’t just emptied them on their usual rounds - they’ve been there for 6 weeks!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71, Crayford Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Fly-tip Large - More than a van load

item.title: Illegal firework display debris, 2nd November
item.description:
Firework debris left from illegal display left by caged play area. This poses a risk to dogs who will pick up and ingest chemicals. Many rockets were left upright in ground causing a safety risk to off lead dogs who could impale themselves

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bladindon Drive, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No streetlamps on entire street, 2nd November
item.description:
There has been no lighting on Sterry Street and Southall place for over a year This is very frightening especially now that the clocks have gone back . This needs sorting immediately before there is an accident or something worse .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southall Place, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
